page.title: 13TRAFFIC SURVEY NEAR MOIRA
page.content: Being a rural area there are very few forms of transport.The area is part of a bus route but the services are few. The majority of the people own cars or landrovers.We surveyed three types of road as to the volume of traffic.The three roads were as follows: the M1,the Moira road and the Dunygarton road.Each survey lasted 15 minutes-from 1.15 to 1.30 on a Thursday.The motorway was by far the busiest with some 732 vehicles.The Moira road would come next with 202 vehicles.The Dunygarton road is little more than a lane with only one tractor using it during the time.
